description: The country has a fondness for these playgrounds, a plethora spanning old-school amusement parks and tech-centric wonders. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Family playtime in Japan’s theme parks
title_page: Family playtime in Japan’s theme parks | The Straits Times
maintext:
TOKYO – Stepping out of the green warp pipe, I do a double-take.
Piranha plants are bobbing out of plumber pipes and widening their teeth-lined jaws. Koopas are dashing to and fro, spinning golden coins are speckled across the hills, and Yoshi is orbiting around a tree.
